CADI.Server.Request

Class HTTPRequestReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • CADI.Server.Request.HTTPRequestReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatusCodes

    public class HTTPRequestReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements StatusCodes
    This class reads HTTP client requests. This class only a simple parse of the requests, check that the request line had the method, request URI, and the HTTP protocol version. Regarding the HTTP headers, it only check that the header keys were an allowed key.

    Usage example:
      construct
      readHTTPRequest

    Version:
    1.1.2 2011/05/31
    Author:
    Group on Interactive Coding of Images (GICI)
